SELECT SSN_NUM , FRST_NM , LAST_NM , MDDL_NM , STREET_ADDRS , CITY , STATE , ZIPCODE , HOME_TEL , CEL_TEL , E_MAIL , POSITION , LOCATION , RELATED_YN , WORK_STYLE , ADULT_YN , SKILLS , REGI_NM , MODI_NM , WORK_YN FROM T_EMPLOYEE WHERE WORK_YN = "Y"
AND LOCATION = #{_parameter}

SELECT * FROM
T_EMPLOYEE AS a
INNER JOIN T_EDUCATION AS b
ON a.SSN_NUM = b.SSN_NUM
INNER JOIN T_WORK_HIST AS c
ON a.SSN_NUM = c.SSN_NUM
WHERE a.SSN_NUM = #{_parameter};
